name: Pixel Zombie Strike 3D
description:
Try Pixel Zombie Strike 3D Deadly Game!
This is a pocket edition for mobile devices. Now you have a perfect chance to battle with Creepy Zombies.

Furthermore, in Game, you can select different Weapons
Download the latest version now and begin your fun-filled journey through the Pixel Zombie Strike 3D!


MAIN FEATURES:
• Completely different Zombie worlds.
• Many different kinds of Zombies enemies.
• Unique types of weapons.


Pixel Zombie Strike 3D is:
• Millions of players all around the world;
• Great HD graphics;
• Exciting sound effects;

Join the exciting world of Pixel Zombie Strike 3D!
